Decision on Nitro-Liberty replacement Chrysler is near a decision on the replacement for the lightly regarded Dodge Nitro and Jeep Liberty SUVs, built at the company's Toledo North Assembly plant, Sergio Marchionne said. It's the most significant hole in our product portfolio, said Sergio Marchionne , referring to the mid-sized SUV segment.
